formatted_address: 21 Choa Chu Kang North 6, #B1-40 Point, Singapore 689578
name: Take-Out Salad

reviews.text: Salad base is half the bowl, ingredients portion is little especially the protein. Server was pouring the remaining chicken don't know whether he don't bother to top up as the portion is so little. Saw another person's protein portion infront of me was more. The only decent portion size is the soba maybe because its carbs? Taste is okay. Portion to price could be better.
Nice salad with fresh ingredients. I tried the hawaiian salad, would recommend

I’ve been a loyal customer of this salad shop since they first opened six years ago, and they’ve truly redefined what a salad can be. Normally, I’m not a big fan of salads, but theirs are in a league of their own, especially with their signature peanut lime sauce. It’s so unique and flavorful—it takes the whole salad experience to a new level of deliciousness.

Despite staying far from the shop, I never mind traveling the distance just to get my hands on their salads. They’re worth every mile! I often order in bulk for my colleagues at the office, and everyone loves it just as much as I do.

If you’re looking for a fresh, tasty, and satisfying meal, I can’t recommend this place enough. They’ve turned me into a salad lover, and I’m sure they’ll do the same for you!
Highly recommend their low calorie meal. Great service and food is fresh!
Good service from Jason and the portion quite big and delicious too ..Very worth it..
